items.question: What video quality does the slow zoom effect generate?
items.answer: The slow zoom effect creates videos in up to 1080p quality, depending on the selected duration and settings. You’ll receive professional-grade animations that enhance visual storytelling.

items.question: Can I control the zoom speed and direction?
items.answer: Yes! You have full control over the zoom effect parameters, including speed, direction, and focus point. Simply describe your desired outcome, and our AI will execute it.

items.question: What image types work best for the slow zoom effect?
items.answer: Clear product images with high resolution work best for the slow zoom effect, with recommended dimensions of at least 512x512 pixels. Formats like JPG, PNG, and WebP are supported.

items.question: How does this differ from simple video slideshows?
items.answer: Unlike basic slideshows, the slow zoom effect creates fluid motion that brings your image to life, integrating natural zoom transitions that feel organic and engaging.

items.question: Can I edit the zoom effect after generation?
items.answer: Currently, the AI-generated slow zoom effect cannot be adjusted post-generation. However, you can create numerous variations or select different images to generate new effects.

items.question: What pricing model applies to the slow zoom feature?
items.answer: WaveSpeed operates on a flexible pay-as-you-go plan, so you only pay for the slow zoom videos you generate, making it budget-friendly without any hidden costs.

items.question: How long does it take to produce the slow zoom videos?
items.answer: Typically, generating a slow zoom video takes about 1-2 minutes, allowing for rapid content creation whether for marketing or social media purposes.

items.question: What are the best use cases for the slow zoom effect?
items.answer: This feature is perfect for creating engaging product showcases, grabbing attention on social media, and enhancing presentation materials across all platforms.

items.question: Do I own rights to the videos generated with the slow zoom effect?
items.answer: Yes! All videos created include full commercial use rights, allowing you to utilize them across various platforms without additional licensing fees.

items.question: Is there support available for using this feature?
items.answer: WaveSpeed provides extensive resources, including guides and tutorials related to the slow zoom effect. Our support team is always here to help if you encounter issues.
